info.name: mudcat - magnify posts
info.description:
Doubles the font-size of posts for viewing on a phone in portrait mode.
Version 2 13-10-2017
info.additionalInfo: This userstyle is designed for viewing mudcat on a phone in portrait mode. It doubles the font-size of the posts, which occupy the full width of the viewport and cannot be zoomed without going off the edge of the screen.
